summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A TEGOL OUTLAW MOTORCYCLE HELMET, MODEL: V5-45, SIZE: EXTRA LARGE. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17E015000 (EQUIPMENT). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 1-866-371-0281 APPROXIMATELY TWO MONTHS AGO. THE CONTACT LEFT THE REQUIRED VOICEMAIL FOR A CALLBACK. AN EMAIL WAS NOT SENT TO THE MANUFACTURER. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE.
